DKIMSigning.^description: DKIM signing is not enabled for this email identity. DKIM (DomainKeys Identified Mail) helps prevent email spoofing and improves email deliverability by providing cryptographic authentication.

DKIMStatus.^description: DKIM authentication is not in SUCCESS status. This may indicate DNS configuration issues that could affect email deliverability and authentication.

MailFromDomain.^description: Custom MAIL FROM domain is not configured. Using a custom MAIL FROM domain improves email deliverability and provides better control over the email sending reputation.

SendingEnabled.^description: Account sending is disabled for SES. This prevents any emails from being sent from this account.

TLSPolicy.^description: TLS is not required for email delivery. Requiring TLS ensures that emails are transmitted securely and helps protect against man-in-the-middle attacks.

SandboxMode.^description: SES account appears to be in sandbox mode with limited sending capabilities. In sandbox mode, you can only send emails to verified addresses and have low sending limits.
